text: Suicide Bridge is a novel by Iain Sinclair. The book examines the characters of William Blake's Jerusalem as influenced by their psychogeography. The book mixes poetry with prose essays.http://www.litencyc.com/php/sworks.php?rec=true&UID;=10512 ==Bibliography== *http://www.complete-review.com/reviews/sinclairi/suicide.htm * ==References== ==External links== * *"Iain Sinclair: Revolutionary Novelist or Revolting Nihilist?", militant esthetix, Ben Watson Category:1979 British novels
title: Suicide Bridge
